templateActivities.title: Battery properly installed
templateActivities.description: Make sure that battery and cover are securely mounted and locked

templateActivities.title: Brake knock test
templateActivities.description: Pull both brakes and rock bike back and forth to test for knocks

templateActivities.title: Chain lubed
templateActivities.description: Check that chain is lubed, and re-apply if needed

templateActivities.title: Charge battery
templateActivities.description: Check battery level and charge if needed

templateActivities.title: Check axles
templateActivities.description: Check that both axles are properly installed and torqued

templateActivities.title: Check dropper post
templateActivities.description: Check that dropper post moves up, down, and stays where it should

templateActivities.title: Check gears
templateActivities.description: Check that gears are indexed properly and all gears can be used

templateActivities.title: Check rear derailleur
templateActivities.description: Check that the rear mech is securely attached and not bent or damaged

templateActivities.title: Check/fix tyre pressure
templateActivities.description: Check pressure on both tyres, and inflate if necessary.

templateActivities.title: Electronics OK
templateActivities.description: Check bike computer works, and all ride levels function

templateActivities.title: Charge extra battery
templateActivities.description: Extra battery charged and ready

templateActivities.title: Check bottom bracket
templateActivities.description: Turn pedals with bike on bike stand ideally with chain removed, listen and feel for grinding

templateActivities.title: Check brake pads
templateActivities.description: Check brake pads with wheel out, all round the pads, as they may wear unevenly and look OK from top but a disaster underneath

templateActivities.title: Check brake rotor securely attached
templateActivities.description: Check that disc bolts or lockring are properly torqued

templateActivities.title: Check chainring
templateActivities.description: Chainring bolts or lockring torqued

templateActivities.title: Check cleats + shoes
templateActivities.description: SPD cleats secure in shoes and pedal connection working

templateActivities.title: Check cockpit
templateActivities.description: Check that all levers and shifters are secured

templateActivities.title: Check crank bolts
templateActivities.description: Crank bolts torqued

templateActivities.title: Check crank pre-tensioned (if needed)
templateActivities.description: Cranks pre-tensioned (if required by crankset)

templateActivities.title: Check dropper
templateActivities.description: Seatpost works properly (up, down, stays in position)

templateActivities.title: Check dropper lever
templateActivities.description: Dropper lever works smoothly

templateActivities.title: Check freehub
templateActivities.description: Check that freehub/cassette is working and does not make unusual noises or play

templateActivities.title: Check headset pre-tension
templateActivities.description: Make sure headset is pre-tension and bolt properly torqued. Do this before you check the stem and faceplate.

templateActivities.title: Check motor bolts
templateActivities.description: Motor bolts secure

templateActivities.title: Check pedals
templateActivities.description: Pedals secure with no play + pedal pins in place

templateActivities.title: Check saddle bolts
templateActivities.description: Saddle bolts torqued

templateActivities.title: Check seatpost bolts
templateActivities.description: Seatpost bolts torqued

templateActivities.title: Check spokes
templateActivities.description: Check that spoke tension is similar around the wheels

templateActivities.title: Check stem and faceplate bolts
templateActivities.description: Make sure stem and faceplate bolts are properly torqued. Do this after headset pre-tension check.

templateActivities.title: Check suspension is clean
templateActivities.description: Not weeping oil from anywhere

templateActivities.title: Check suspension is quiet
templateActivities.description: No squelching sounds

templateActivities.title: Check suspension works
templateActivities.description: moves freely and correctly pressured

templateActivities.title: Check tyre sealant
templateActivities.description: Shake wheel and listen for liquid. If not, refill sealant

templateActivities.title: Check wheel bearings
templateActivities.description: Do the wheels rotate freely, without grinding noises

templateActivities.title: Check whether brakes need bleeding
templateActivities.description: Check brakes don't need to be ‘pumped’ to stop them pulling to the bars

templateActivities.title: Lubricate suspension
templateActivities.description: Lubricate stanchions

templateActivities.title: No noises from drive
templateActivities.description: Drive is smooth with no noises or clunks or grinding

templateActivities.title: Shifter / cable work smoothly
templateActivities.description: Check that shifter and cable work smoothly, replace if needed

templateActivities.title: BB bearings smooth
templateActivities.description: BB bearings smooth and greased

templateActivities.title: Bleed brakes
templateActivities.description: Bleed brakes

templateActivities.title: Chain is not too worn
templateActivities.description: Chain not beyond .5 (if its, replace whole drivetrain before holiday - chain, cassette, chainring)

templateActivities.title: Check electric cables
templateActivities.description: Electric cables all with smooth run and no kinks

templateActivities.title: Consider rebuilding motor/bearings
templateActivities.description: If out of warranty, consider rebuilding motor/bearings from places like ebike motor centre

templateActivities.title: Grips OK
templateActivities.description: Grips no over worn

templateActivities.title: Headset bearings smooth
templateActivities.description: Headset bearings smooth and greased

templateActivities.title: Lube caliper pistons
templateActivities.description: Lube caliper pistons

templateActivities.title: Pivot bearings smooth
templateActivities.description: Pivot bearings smooth and travel freely, and greased

templateActivities.title: Rims are fine
templateActivities.description: Check rims for cracks or bad dents - if has, replace before holiday

templateActivities.title: Service Suspension
templateActivities.description: Suspension serviced (could be just a lowers/air can service, but better a full rebuild from reputable source e.g. TFT, J-tech, silverfish (fox) etc)

templateActivities.title: Take extra battery
templateActivities.description: Extra battery (or does currently battery have good enough condition for big days)

templateActivities.title: Tyres OK
templateActivities.description: Tyres not over worn or with knobs missing

templateActivities.title: Use warranty now
templateActivities.description: Issues worth warrantying before holiday?

templateActivities.title: Wheel bearings rotate smoothly
templateActivities.description: Check whether wheel bearings are turning smoothly, replace if needed
